Icon stacking

You can overlay more icon at specific positions and a specific color <i>file<i>?</i></i> = file?

  • file? Unknow file
  • folderarrow-down Download folder
  • bellnot silence
  • mail-outline8 8 Messages
  • smookingnot No smooking
  • imagechain Image URL
  • mailmail-attachment Mail with attachment
  • file+ File Add
  • filestar File Create
  • folder+ Folder add
  • folderstar Folder create
  • bluetoothtool-magnifier Search bluetooth
  • folderimage Photo album
  • folderdevice-gamepad Photo album
  • callarrow-forward Photo album
  • callchevron-right Photo album
  • calltrack-pause Photo album
